name: Jenny Jones
description:
Jenny Jones...

Honestly, this is the first time you, the reader, have thought of Jenny Jones in... two decades, give or take? If you ever thought of Jenny Jones in the first place. We definitely didn't, yet here we are.

Of course, Jenny Jones is most famous for a murder that happened as a result of her talk show. A man revealed his homosexuality to his crush; in return, he got killed. Somehow, the show kept going for a few more years. 

Jenny Jones was born in Bethlehem. Not Bethlehem, Pennsylvania, but Bethlehem, Palestine. Yes, we said Palestine; in 1946, there was no Israel yet. Strangely, this probably makes her one of the most famous Palestinians in America, and we will leave it to you, the reader, to figure out if that makes her Israeli.

No, Jenny Jones is not Jewish. And now we will stop thinking about Jenny Jones for another two decades...
